info.description: This is a sample server Mai-Roi-Ra api gateway.
info.title: Mai-Roi-Ra Swagger API

post.description: Sends an announcement email to the specified recipients.

400.description: Bad request - error in sending the announcement

post.description: Sends an Cancelled email to the specified recipients.

400.description: Bad request - error in sending the CancelledEmail

post.description: Create a new event with the provided details.

get.description: Get list of all participant in the events

put.description: Update an existing event with the provided details.

delete.description: Delete an event with the specified ID.

post.description: Logs in a user by their email, phone number, and password.
Logs in a user by their email and password.
post.summary: Log in a user with email

parameters.description: Log in a user with Email
parameters.name: request

post.description: Logs in a user by their phone number and password.
post.summary: Log in a user with phone

parameters.description: Log in a user with Phone
parameters.name: request

post.description: Logs out a user by invalidating the session token associated with the uid.

200.description: Confirms the user has been logged out.

400.description: Returns an error if logout fails.

post.description: Sends an Registered email to the specified recipients.

400.description: Bad request - error in sending the RegisteredEmail

post.description: Sends an Reminder email to the specified recipients.

400.description: Bad request - error in sending the ReminderEmail

post.description: Create a new user with the provided details.

get.description: Get list of all participated events of the user

put.description: Toggle the enabling notification for user

post.description: Register an event based on user_id and event_id

delete.description: Cancel Register an event based on user_id and event_id

put.description: Update User information with the desired input

get.description: Validates a user's authentication token and returns the associated user details if valid.

200.description: Returns user details on successful token validation.

400.description: Returns an error if the token is invalid or expired.

phone_number.description: Replace "phone_length_constraint" with actual SQL check expression if needed

users.description: FIXME should not use struct from models
